articles.author: Utathya Nag
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympics: India medals tally and winners list - full table - Olympics
articles.description: Know list of Indian medal winners at the Paris 2024 Olympics. Get medals tally and know how many medals Indian athletes have won in each sport. Full table.
articles.content:
A total of 117 Indian athletes, including five reserves, are on the hunt for medals and sporting immortality at the Paris 2024 Olympics, which runs from July 26 to August 11.
There will be Indian in… [+2024 chars]

articles.title: ‘Huge disappointment’: Jwala Gutta criticises India’s Olympic uniforms designed by Tarun Tahiliani - The Indian Express
articles.description: In a post on X, Jwala Gutta called the Indian Olympic uniforms "shabby".
articles.content: Tarun Tahiliani, popular designer known for his craft of blending modernity and textile heritage, is facing backlash for his ikat-inspired uniforms for the India contingent at the 2024 Paris Olympics… [+2127 chars]
